headline: Johnson Controls’ Sensormatic Solutions Launches AI-Powered Shopper Tracking with Privacy-First Re-ID Technology
summary: Johnson Controls International (NYSE:JCI) is one of the best manufacturing stocks to buy according to hedge funds. On July 8, Sensormatic Solutions, which is a retail solutions portfolio of Johnson Controls, announced the launch of new people-counting devices enabled with Re-Identification (Re-ID) technology and advanced deep learning AI capabilities. This development provides retailers with more […]
